name: cloudscape
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a view of sky with an interesting appearance of clouds in it, or a work of art that represents this: Strands of early morning mist lingered as the sun tried to break through the patchy cloudscape. The work is an Impressionist cloudscape.
More examplesFewer examplesPhotographs of dramatic cloudscapes and storms thrill weather enthusiasts.She glanced up and saw that the ceiling had been painted as a vast rolling cloudscape.At the centre of the painting, small and dark against the cloudscape, is a house.In his last years he painted many huge cloudscapes.
